title: Can't get to emails
content: I tried to setup the beta and now I am in a loop and can't get to my emails, I don.t really want to use Beta and just want my emails. I have contributed a few times and don't want to change, but if I must I will. Sorry.
creator: stanfacey

title: Ho scritto una mail ma improvvisamente non vedo più la parte sinistra dove ho evidenziato una lista di indirizzi mail e non posso modificarla! che fare?
content: Non vedo più il riquadro a sinistra della compilazione di una mail indirizzata ad un elenco di destinatari e quindi non posso modificare/aggiornare i loro indirizzi.
creator: riccamato

title: Add tags while sending mail to someone
content: I am sending mails using IMAP functionality in PHP. now my concern is that i want to send mail to users with tag. like if i sending a mail related to work then i want to add 'Work' tag to the mail that i am sending to user. when user open that mail 'Work' tag will be visible there.
creator: jainilr.ap

title: virheilmoitus käyttäjätunnuksesta

title: I don't remember my password. How do I create a new one?
content: I have just gone to Beta and finally retrieved my contacts and messages. But I can't send or receive messages because I don't remember my password. How the heck do I create a new one?
creator: lancaster1
